body:
Hey, So today Im bringing you guys a Tournament!!

To Participate with your team you´ll have to comment:

- Name of your team
- Leader´s In game Name
-Leader´s skype account.

And You´ll play the Tourney. The host is Neutral, So, It´ll work perfectly For both European and American People

The Staff Members that will organize this will be:

Organizator(1)
- JeniusPvP

Referees(1)
-ToggleControl
Livestreamers(1)
- ToggleControl

We don´t need mor Referees and Livestreamers since more Of both are coming!!!

Good luck and Apply with your team!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
